alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 11:35AM CST until January 20 at 8:24PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Amory For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Amory. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 20.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.3 feet on 01/20/1988. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
